DataElement.preferredName: Progesterone Receptor Percentage Intensity Stain Description Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The date related to the description or status of progesterone receptors, specific proteins found in or on cells of progesterone target tissues that specifically combine with progesterone, based on percentage and intensity of stained cells.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Progesterone Receptor Percentage Intensity Stain Description
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the description or status of progesterone receptors, specific proteins found in or on cells of progesterone target tissues that specifically combine with progesterone, based on percentage and intensity of stained cells.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Specific proteins found in or on cells of progesterone target tissues that specifically combine with progesterone. The cytosol progesterone-receptor complex then associates with the nucleic acids to initiate protein synthesis. There are two kinds of progesterone receptors, A and B. Both are induced by estrogen and have short half-lives.

Concepts.definition: Progesterone receptor (933 aa, ~99 kDa) is encoded by the human PGR gene. This protein is involved in the regulation of transcription.

Property.preferredDefinition: Percentage; a fraction or ratio with 100 understood as the denominator.:The degree or magnitude of strength, energy, or feeling.:a dye or other coloring material that is used in microscopy to make structures visible.:Description; a statement that represents something in words.

Concepts.definition: A fraction or ratio with 100 understood as the denominator.
The degree or magnitude of strength, energy, or feeling.
a dye or other coloring material that is used in microscopy to make structures visible.
A written or verbal account, representation, statement, or explanation of something.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the process of identifying a disease by the signs and symptoms (NCI Glossary).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation was made or an event occurred.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.
